title: Top Places to visit in Palakkad, Kerala
content: Palakkad About this soundpronunciation (help·info), also known as Palghat, is a city and municipality in the state of Kerala in southern India, spread over an area of 26.60 km2 and is the administrative headquarters of the Palakkad District. title: Top Places to visit in Pathanamthitta, Kerala
content: Pathanamthitta is a town and a municipality situated in the Central Travancore region in the state of Kerala, India, spread over an area of 23.50 km2. title: Top Places to visit in Thrissur, Kerala
content: Thrissur, also known by its former name Trichur) is a city and capital of the Thrissur district in Kerala, India. title: Top Places to visit in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala
content: Thiruvananthapuram, commonly known by its former name Trivandrum, is the capital of the Indian state of Kerala. title: Top Places to visit in Wayanad, Kalpetta, Kerala
content: Wayanad is an Indian district in the north-east of Kerala state with administrative headquarters at the municipality of Kalpetta. Top Places to visit in Ashok Nagar, Madhya Pradesh
content: Ashoknagar (also Ashok Nagar) is a city and a Municipality Council in Ashoknagar District in Madhya Pradesh state of central India. Top Places to visit in Barwani, Madhya Pradesh
content: Barwani is a town and a municipality in Barwani district in the state of Madhya Pradesh, India. The town is situated near the left bank of the Narmada River, and is the administrative headquarters of Barwani District. It has served as the capital of the former princely state of Barwani. title: Top Places to visit in Betul, Madhya Pradesh
content: Betul is a district and municipality in southern Madhya Pradesh, India. It is the administrative center of its eponymous district and forms the southernmost part of the Bhopal Division in the Betul (Lok Sabha constituency).
